latestVersion.versionNote: deleted RNAi sets & Madrid conference disambiguation results

fields.value: The careers and co-authorship networks of U.S. patent-holders, since 1975

dsDescriptionValue.value: We describe disambiguation algorithms that identify individual inventors from the U.S.patent database. The identification enables construction of social networks based on patent co-authorship. We will eventually provide descriptive statistics of individual and collaborative variables and illustrated examples of networks for an individual, an organization, a technology, and a region. The data and code will be publically available for community use and improvement and will enable updating as frequently as new patents are issued.

producerName.value: Harvard Institute for Quantitative Social Science

distributorName.value: Harvard Institute for Quantitative Social Science

files.description: (Updated 2/24/2009 2:23 PM. Added additional AppDate entries.) Main inventors dataset with unique inventor identifiers. Includes information on assignee, coinventors, and location.
